select
,
,
from pitaya_user U left outer join pitaya_user_role_detail UR on UR.user_id = U.id left outer join pitaya_role R on R.id = UR.role_id where U.account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and U.password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and U.enabled = true

from pitaya_user where enabled = true
